FinancialAccountFee.name: FinancialAccountFee
FinancialAccountFee.description: Represents the charges levied on a financial account

Amount.description: The amount that is charged for the request.

EndDate.description: The date until when the applicable fee is charged on the financial account.

FinancialAccountId.description: The financial account to which the fee is charged.

Frequency.description: The frequency at which applicable fee is charged on the financial account, such as yearly or monthly.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date when a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date when a user viewed this record.

Rate.description: The amount in percentage that is charged for the request.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of the financial account fee in an external system.

StartDate.description: The date from when the applicable fee is charged on the financial accouint.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the financial account fee.
